Standard: Oh, have you ever wondered why I always buy a lot of toast?
GER: Oh, hast du dich jemals gefragt, warum ich immer viel Toast kaufe?
KOR: 혹시 왜 제가 항상 토스트를 많이 사는지 궁금한 적이 있으신가요?

Standard: As I was walking through the streets,
GER: Als ich durch die Straßen ging,

Standard: the smell of toast came out,
GER: der Geruch von Toast kam heraus,

Standard: so I bought toast for my pilot colleagues,
GER: Also kaufte ich Toast für meine Pilot kollegen,
KOR: 그래서 파일럿 동료들을 위해 토스트를 샀는데

Standard: and they all said it was delicious.
GER: und alle sagten, es sei köstlich.

Standard: They all really enjoyed eating toast.
GER: Sie alle genossen es wirklich, Toast zu essen.
KOR: 그들 모두 토스트 먹는 것을 정말로 즐겼습니다.

Standard: Since then, I have been buying them regularly here.
GER: Seitdem kaufe ich sie hier regelmäßig.
KOR: 그 이후로 이곳에서 정기적으로 구매하고 있습니다.

Standard: The toast here is really good!
GER: Der Toast hier ist wirklich gut!

Standard: By the way, do you like airplanes?
I'll come back to get the toast later.
GER: Ich werde später zurückkommen, um den Toast zu holen.
